Question: This person received 1,866,452 votes, Douglas 1,376,957 votes, Breckinridge 849,781 votes, and Bell 588,789 votes.
Hints: This person became increasingly distant from his father, in part because of his father's lack of education.
This person then made an extended visit to Grant's headquarters at City Point, Virginia.
In 1846, this person was elected to the U.S House of Representatives, where he served one two-year term.
